IndicatorName: Total number of households per municipality
Theme: Household And Living Conditions
Description: Provinces with high number of municipalities with high number (%) of households

Theme: Dwelling Type
Description: Provinces with high number of municipalities with high average household size
Ratings:
Low: number of municipalities below provincial average household size
Moderate: number of municipalities equivalent to provincial average household size
High: number of municipalities exceeding provincial average household size

IndicatorName: Percentage of households with formal dwellings per municipality
Theme: Indicators For Need Municipal Profiling And Provincial Differentiation
Description: Provinces with high number of municipalities with low percentages of households with formal dwellings
Ratings:
Low: number of municipalities below provincial average household size
Moderate: number of municipalities equivalent to provincial average household size
High: number of municipalities exceeding provincial average household size

IndicatorName: Percentage of household with access to water, sanitation, electricity, and waste collection per municipality
Theme: Access To Service Access And Quality
Description: Provinces with high number of municipalities households with low percentages of access to water, sanitation, and electricity
Ratings:
Low: below 30% coverage
Moderate: 30-60%
High: Above 60%
Source:
Non-financial census of municipalities for the year ended 30 June 2023
Quantec

IndicatorName: Water and sanitation quality water per municipality (blue drop, green drop status)
Theme: Quality Of Basic Services
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities in each province that provide services; water, sanitation, electricity, waste of municipalities with low water and sanitation  quality
Ratings:
Blue Drop report evaluates the quality of drinking water and the efficiency of water treatment and distribution systems.

Green Drop report assesses the performance of wastewater treatment plants

Both reports use indicators like infrastructure condition, maintenance, operational efficiency, staff qualifications, and treatment process compliance to evaluate performance

IndicatorName: Number of consumer units using the bucket toilet system provided by municipalities in each province
Theme: Indicators For Need Municipal Profiling And Provincial Differentiation
Description: Provinces with high number of municipalities with high percentages of consumer units using the bucket toilet system provided by municipalities
Source:
Non-financial census of municipalities for the year ended 30 June 2023
Quantec

IndicatorName: Percentage of the population living below a certain income level (poverty line)
Theme: Poverty
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high number (%) of people living under upper bound poverty line (R1,634 per person per month: 2024)
Ratings:
Low: municipalities with households living above poverty line
Moderate: municipalities with households living within the poverty line
High: municipalities with households living below poverty line

Theme: Unemployment
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high unemployment rate
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with unemployment rate below provincial rate
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with unemployment rate equivalent to provincial rate
High: provinces with municipalities with unemployment rate above provincial rate

Theme: Inequality
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high Gini-coefficient
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with youth Gini-coefficient below provincial rate
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with youth Gini-coefficient equivalent to provincial rate
High: provinces with municipalities with youth Gini-coefficient above provincial rate

Theme: Household Income
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with low household income
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with household income below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with household income equivalent to provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with household income above provincial average

Theme: Trade Balance
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with GDP below provincial average 
Moderate: province with municipalities GDP below provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with GDP above provincial average

Theme: Social And Health
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high infant mortality rate
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with infant mortality rate below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with infant mortality rate within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with infant mortality rate above provincial average

Theme: Indicators For Need Municipal Profiling And Provincial Differentiation
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with low life expectancy
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rate below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rate within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rate above provincial average

Theme: Indicators For Need Municipal Profiling And Provincial Differentiation
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high mortality rate
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with child mortality rate below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with child mortality rate within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with child mortality rate above provincial average

Theme: Education
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with low literacy rate
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with literacy rate below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with literacy rate within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with literacy rate above provincial average

Theme: Safety And Security
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high crime rates
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with crime rates below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with crime rates within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with crime rates above provincial average

Theme: Life Expectancy
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with low life expectancy rate
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rates below provincial average
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rates within provincial average
High: provinces with municipalities with life expectancy rates above provincial average

Theme: Population Dynamics
Description: Provinces with high number (%) of municipalities with high population
Ratings:
Low: provinces with municipalities with total population below provincial percentages
Moderate: provinces with municipalities with total population equivalent to provincial percentages
High: provinces with municipalities with total population above provincial percentages

Theme: Indicators For Need Municipal Profiling And Provincial Differentiation

Moderate: provinces with municipalities with population growth rate equivalent to provincial percentages
